title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, completion, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, PDF, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, model management and streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-powered interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion backend for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-npc
summary: Generate NPC dialog for games using Ollama models via JSON schema constrained generation.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, embeddings and model management; targets .NET 6+.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing and cross-compilation support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that streams Ollama answers into threads; built with Bolt for Python.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama: chat, embeddings and model ops with GenServer-backed process pools.

title: ollama-r
summary: R wrapper for Ollama enabling local LLM chat inside RStudio and Shiny apps.

title: ollama-php
summary: Community PHP SDK for Ollama; PSR-18 HTTP client agnostic with Laravel package discovery.
